main.controller

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • main.controller.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread
    Odometer object used to keep track of vehicle position at all times.
    Author:
    JohnWu
